page.title: 18Drusillas Zoo
page.content:
You are welcome at Drusillas Zoo any time in the year. Drusillas,like all good zoos,are helping to save the world's endangered species. The animals kept in the zoo include llamas,birds,monkeys,penguins and wallabies. There is also a section devoted to farmyard animals and a nocturnal house which allows you to see some of the creatures that live in a twilight world.
Each year thousands of children visit the zoo on educational trips. Pupils are encouraged to learn about the animals and this is seen as an important part of Drusillas work. Various schemes have been set up to help this including adopting an animal and the Jobex scheme where pupils are encouraged to work alongside the staff of the zoo.
